languages.text: "Красное, черное, красное, черное... и очень много белого-белого страха. Весь город дрожит! Нет... весь мир!"
"Red, black, red, black... and lots of blinding white fear. The whole city's quaking! No — the whole world!"
languages.original_text: "Красное, черное, красное, черное... и очень много белого-белого страха. Весь город дрожит! Нет... весь мир!"

traits.locale_text: "Red, black, red, black... and lots of very very white fear. The whole city's quaking! No — the whole world!"
"Red, black, red, black... and lots of very very white fear. The whole city's quaking! No — the whole world!"
"Red, black, red, black... and lots of blinding white fear. The whole city's quaking! No — the whole world!"
"Red, black, red, black... and lots of blinding white fear. The whole city's quaking! No — the whole world!"
"Red, black, red, black... and lots of blinding white fear. The whole city's quaking! No — the whole world!"
"Red, black, red, black... and lots of blinding white fear. The whole city's quaking! No — the whole world!"

languages.text: "Rot, Schwarz, Rot, Schwarz ... und jede Menge blendend weiße Angst. Die ganze Stadt bebt! Nein — die ganze Welt!"
languages.original_text: "Red, black, red, black... and lots of blinding white fear. The whole city's quaking! No — the whole world!"

traits.locale_text: "Rot, Schwarz, Rot, Schwarz ... und jede Menge blendend weiße Angst. Die ganze Stadt bebt! Nein — die ganze Welt!"

languages.text: « Rouge, noir, rouge, noir... et beaucoup de peur blanche aveuglante. La cité entière tremble ! Non... le monde entier ! »
languages.original_text: "Red, black, red, black... and lots of blinding white fear. The whole city's quaking! No — the whole world!"

traits.locale_text: « Rouge, noir, rouge, noir... et beaucoup de peur blanche aveuglante. La cité entière tremble ! Non... le monde entier ! »

languages.text: “红色，黑色……到处都是……还有无数刺眼的白色恐惧。整座城市都在颤抖！不！是整个世界！”
languages.original_text: "Red, black, red, black... and lots of blinding white fear. The whole city's quaking! No — the whole world!"

traits.locale_text: “红色，黑色……到处都是……还有无数刺眼的白色恐惧。整座城市都在颤抖！不！是整个世界！”

languages.text: 「赤、黒、赤、黒…そしてまぶしい白い恐怖がたくさん。街全体が震えている！いや、世界全体が！」
languages.original_text: "Red, black, red, black... and lots of blinding white fear. The whole city's quaking! No — the whole world!"

traits.locale_text: 「赤、黒、赤、黒…そしてまぶしい白い恐怖がたくさん。街全体が震えている！いや、世界全体が！」

languages.text: «Rojo, negro, rojo, negro... y mucho miedo blanco cegador. ¡Toda la ciudad está temblando! No, ¡el mundo entero!».
languages.original_text: "Red, black, red, black... and lots of blinding white fear. The whole city's quaking! No — the whole world!"

traits.locale_text: «Rojo, negro, rojo, negro... y mucho miedo blanco cegador. ¡Toda la ciudad está temblando! No, ¡el mundo entero!».

languages.text: "Kırmızı, siyah, kırmızı, siyah... Bir de göz kamaştıran bembeyaz korku, bolca... Bütün şehir, hatta bütün dünya gümbür gümbür!"
languages.original_text: "Red, black, red, black... and lots of blinding white fear. The whole city's quaking! No — the whole world!"

traits.locale_text: "Kırmızı, siyah, kırmızı, siyah... Bir de göz kamaştıran bembeyaz korku, bolca... Bütün şehir, hatta bütün dünya gümbür gümbür!"
